sentences.english: All those watching were nervous and held all held their breath in great anticipation.
sentences.chinese: 旁邊觀看的人都很緊張，爲荀息迭累雞蛋捏一把汗。

sentences.english: We were breathless as we watched the acrobats.
sentences.chinese: 看着他們表演雜技，我們都捏一把汗。
